Package model

Class Checker

java.lang.Object
model.Checker
public class Checker extends Object
Checker is a singleton class used for input validation and time conversions. Contains static methods for the controllers to use

    • overlap

      Parameters:
      appointment - Appointment object
      Returns:
      true if a customer has overlapping appointments
      Throws:
      SQLException - database error

    • alertFifteen

      public static void alertFifteen(Boolean val, javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> schedule)
      Displays a notification for any appointments scheduled within 15 minutes
      Parameters:
      val - a boolean value. True for an appointment being within 15 minutes
      schedule - list of all appointments for a contact
